alert.note: Alert for New Madrid (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 2:58PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central New Madrid County through 330 PM CDT... At 258 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Portageville, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Marston around 315 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Lilbourn, Howardville and New Madrid. This includes Interstate 55 between Mile Markers 33 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for western Kentucky...and southeastern Missouri.
